00021 AnalogTriggerOutput::AnalogTriggerOutput(AnalogTrigger *trigger, AnalogTriggerOutput::Type outputType)
00022     : m_trigger (trigger)
00023     , m_outputType (outputType)

00035 bool AnalogTriggerOutput::Get()
00036 {
00037     switch(m_outputType)
00038     {
00039     case kInWindow:
00040         return m_trigger->m_trigger->readOutput_InHysteresis(m_trigger->m_index, &status);
00041     case kState:
00042         return m_trigger->m_trigger->readOutput_OverLimit(m_trigger->m_index, &status);
00043     case kRisingPulse:
00044     case kFallingPulse:
00045         wpi_fatal(AnalogTriggerPulseOutputError);
00046     }
00047     // Should never get here.
00048     wpi_assert(false);
00049     return false;
00050 }
00051 
00055 UINT32 AnalogTriggerOutput::GetChannelForRouting()
00056 {
00057     return (m_trigger->m_index << 2) + m_outputType;
00058 }
00059 
00063 UINT32 AnalogTriggerOutput::GetModuleForRouting()
00064 {
00065     return m_trigger->m_index >> 2;
00066 }
00067 
00071 bool AnalogTriggerOutput::GetAnalogTriggerForRouting()
00072 {
00073     return true;
00074 }
